content:
SearchIndexClient SearchIndexClient Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

Client that can be used to query an Azure Search index and upload, merge, or delete documents.

Edit

In this Article

public class SearchIndexClient : ServiceClient<SearchIndexClient>, ISearchIndexClient, IDisposable, IAzureClientPublic Class SearchIndexClient

    Implements ISearchIndexClient, IDisposable, IAzureClient

Edit

Edit

Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

JsonSerializerSettings JsonSerializerSettings

UseHttpGetForQueries UseHttpGetForQueries

Edit

Indicates whether the index client should use HTTP GET for making Search and Suggest requests to the Azure Search REST API. The default is false, which indicates that HTTP POST will be used.

public bool UseHttpGetForQueries { get; set; }Public Property UseHttpGetForQueries As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

Methods

TargetDifferentIndex(String) TargetDifferentIndex(String)

Edit

Changes the BaseUri of this client to target a different index in the same Azure Search service. This method is NOT thread-safe; You must guarantee that no other threads are using the client before calling it.

public void TargetDifferentIndex(string newIndexName)Public Sub TargetDifferentIndex(newIndexName As String)
Parameters
newIndexName
String String

The name of the index to which all subsequent requests should be sent.
